alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 9:24PM EDT until July 17 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fayette County in central Ohio... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 924 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jeffersonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Mount Sterling, Jeffersonville, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Staunton, Milledgeville, Octa, Jasper Mills, Madison Mills, Interstate 71 at US Route 35 and Pancoastburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 64 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
